text: Ara marubasidera ke'u ke'u allah‌ o sesa dinera upara imana rakhe ebam ya byaya kare take allah‌ra sannidhya o rasulera do’a labhera upaya ganya kare. Jene rakha, niscaya ta tadera jan'ya allah‌ra sannidhya labhera upaya; acire'i allah‌ taderake nija rahamate dakhila karabena [1]. Niscaya allah‌ ksamasila, parama dayalu
